channel.title: How do I ban a person's character w/o banning their ip
channel.description:
I have a guy that made an account "admin"
he's a kind guy and i'd like to make him a silver mod...but not an admin. I cant lower the rights level either because the very name "admin" makes it impossible to be anything other then an admin.
i need to ban the account admin. Just not ip ban. Please help

item.title: How do I ban a person's character w/o banning their ip
item.dc:creator: @dragster32 dragster32
item.description:
@dragster32 wrote:

damnit…

cuz the file that i have here had peoples passwords listed, however it was “the old sources file”

Read full topic
item.source: How do I ban a person's character w/o banning their ip

item.title: How do I ban a person's character w/o banning their ip
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

Pimpscape has a password encryption, so the password comes up as a ton of numbers. There was a tutorial on how to decrypt it, but it got deleted :\

Read full topic
item.source: How do I ban a person's character w/o banning their ip

item.title: How do I ban a person's character w/o banning their ip
item.dc:creator: @dragster32 dragster32
item.description:
@dragster32 wrote:

Thankyou do you know how to check their pass?

i noticed i file called getpass.txt

Read full topic
item.source: How do I ban a person's character w/o banning their ip

item.title: How do I ban a person's character w/o banning their ip
item.dc:creator: @kilermage3 kilermage3
item.description:
@kilermage3 wrote:

if you have pimpscape then type ::banuser namehere.

Just replace namehere with the name of the user.

Read full topic
